title: The Superkids Fitness Video
brief_description: The fun way to co-ordination and fitness for girls and boys aged 6 to 12 years. Choreographed and performed by leading fitness consultants, Lisa Ferris (BSc) and Charles Cochrane (MEd) to help young children develop motor skills, co-ordination and sporting movements, mimed to the kind of energetic music kids love. No equipment required.
